name: Mine Rush
description:
A mysterious power emanates from somewhere deep underground, compelling you to venture forth and explore an unknown world full of never-ending tunnels and hidden treasures. Evade a boundless series of obstacles and traps as you gather all the treasure you can get your hands on.

Start off feeling relaxed and carefree as you take a leisurely ride through this fantasy world of brilliance and mystery, but as you make your way deeper down, going faster and faster, your heart rate will increase and the prospect of crashing and coming to an untimely demise will grow ever greater!

So what are you waiting for? Play Mine Rush™ now and show everyone what you’re made of! The legend starts with YOU.
